Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-49991 affecting package espeak-ng for versions less than 1.52.0-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-49991 affecting package espeak-ng for versions less than 1.52.0-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package espeak-ng is earlier than 1.52.0-1, affected by CVE-2023-49991
